subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins fired the assistants Gregg Williams and Al Saunders on Saturday, promoted Greg Blache to lead the team’s defense, and announced that a head coach would probably not be in place for at least another week.
snippet: The Washington Redskins fired the assistants Gregg Williams and Al Saunders on Saturday, promoted Greg Blache to lead the team’s defense, and announced that a head coach would probably not be in place for at least another week.
